Dengan Hormat,

Sehubungan dengan adanya permintaan harga dari PT Sistem Integrasi Mandiri atas jasa sewa layanan Cloudeka Deka GPU, dengan ini kami PT. Aplikanusa Lintasarta mengajukan Penawaran Harga untuk pekerjaan tersebut:

Deka GPU Kubernetes Platform – Nvidia GPU H100 SXM
10 Days Commitment

| No | Platform | Total vCPU | Total RAM | IP Public | Storage | GPU | 10 Days Cost |
|----|----------|------------|-----------|-----------|---------|-----|--------------|
| 1 | Kubernetes | 32 | 256 GB | 1 unit | 1 TB Tier-2 | 3 x H100 SXM 80 GB | Rp 31,717,000 |

6 Days Commitment

| No | Platform | Total vCPU | Total RAM | IP Public | Storage | GPU | 6 Days Cost |
|----|----------|------------|-----------|-----------|---------|-----|-------------|
| 1 | Kubernetes | 32 | 256 GB | 1 unit | 1 TB Tier-2 | 3 x H100 SXM 80 GB | Rp 21,637,000 |

Add-on Pay Per Hour - No Commitment

| No | Platform | Total vCPU | Total RAM | GPU | Pay Per Hour |
|----|----------|------------|-----------|-----|--------------|
| 1 | Kubernetes | 32 | 256 GB | 3 x H100 SXM 80 GB | Rp 262,000 |

| Add-on Components | Fixed Cost per Month |
|--------------------------|----------------------|
| IP Public, per IP | Rp 75,000 |
| Storage Tier-2 NVMe 1TB | Rp 1,689,600 |

Service is inclusive of:
- Inter-connectivity inside data center using 2 x 200 Gbps ethernet and 8 x 400 Gbps Infiband RDMA networks which is based on Nvidia National Cloud Partner (NCP) design
- Internet sharing bandwidth up to 20 Gbps (IX & IIX)
- Cloud SLA Uptime 99.95% for availability service
- Network and Datacenter facility for Cloud & GPU Service
- Response time 30 minutes

## Pricing is subject to Lintasarta T&C :

* Pricing is exclusive of any applicable taxes.
* Pricing is exclusive of Security Protection
* Referring to additional services such as backup, private connectivity, professional & managed service, etc. are provided in separated offering
* Pricing is solely proposed for PT SIM with validity until Dec 2024
* In the event the customer would have requested the additional 4 days of out 6 days package. Lintasarta will impose at the OTC amount IDR 6,288,000/day
